meanings.definition: Things that are of little importance or value.
meanings.sent1: She spent too much time worrying about trivialities.
meanings.sent2: Let's focus on the important tasks and not get caught up in trivialities.
meanings.sent3: The argument over who should do the dishes turned into a debate about trivialities.
meanings.sent4: In the grand scheme of things, the trivialities of daily life fade away.
meanings.sent5: Her mind was cluttered with trivialities, making it hard to see the bigger picture.

meanings.definition: Matters or details that are insignificant or unimportant.
meanings.sent1: He always gets lost in trivialities and forgets the main goal.
meanings.sent2: Don't waste time on trivialities; focus on what truly matters.
meanings.sent3: The trivialities of the meeting agenda made everyone yawn.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a maze of trivialities, distracting her from the essential tasks.
meanings.sent5: The trivialities of daily life can sometimes cloud our judgment.
